items.title: 7zip
items.content_html: Version 24.09 published on 2024-11-29 The summare of changes are: The latest stable release includes various updates and performance improvements for multiple platforms, ensuring compatibility and enhanced functionality.

items.title: awscli2
items.content_html: Version 2.24.5 published on 2023-10-24 The summare of changes are: Latest stable version with multiple enhancements including test suite names in codebuild metadata, RDS stop DB support, and S3 Content-Range header in HeadObject.

items.title: azurecli
items.content_html: Version 2.69.0 published on 2023-02-11 The summare of changes are: Azure CLI 2.69.0 release includes minor improvements and bug fixes, ensuring enhanced stability and performance.

items.title: bicepcli
items.content_html: Version v0.33.93 published on 2025-01-29 The summare of changes are: Fixes language server crashes and deployment failures, and introduces the Release Deployment Pane as a stable feature.

items.title: bruno
items.content_html: Version v1.39.0 published on 2025-02-14 The summare of changes are: The latest release introduces improved NTLM authentication, a rearrangement feature for table items, and support for cheerio and xml2json as inbuilt libraries, among other enhancements and fixes.

items.title: clink
items.content_html: Version v1.7.10 published on 2023-02-07 The summare of changes are: Added new Lua API unicode.char() for Unicode codepoints and a diagnostics command for troubleshooting. Fixed a crash caused by console width discrepancies.

items.title: dbeaver
items.content_html: Version 24.3.5 published on 2025-02-16 The summare of changes are: Latest stable release with improvements and fixes from prior versions, ensuring enhanced usability and performance. Open-source and accessible for free download.

items.title: dive
items.content_html: Version v0.12.0 published on 2024-02-02 The summare of changes are: Added features for docker layer-wise vulnerability detection, improved GitLab CI support, and fixed compatibility issues with Docker 25+.

items.title: docker-desktop
items.content_html: Version 4.38.0 published on 2025-01-30 The summare of changes are: The latest release includes general availability of the PKG installer, the ability to create multi-node Kubernetes clusters, and independent updates for Docker Compose, Docker Scout, and Docker CLI. Enhanced container isolation and multiple bug fixes were implemented across all platforms.

items.title: dotnet6
items.content_html: Version 6.0.36 published on November 12, 2024 The summare of changes are: This release marks the final version of .NET 6.0, as it has reached end-of-life status. It includes stability and performance improvements. Migration to supported releases such as .NET 9.0 is recommended.

items.title: dotnet8
items.content_html: Version 8.0.13 published on February 11, 2025 The summare of changes are: This latest release includes updates to .NET Runtime, ASP.NET Core Runtime, and .NET Desktop Runtime, enhancing the stability and performance of web and desktop applications.

items.title: drawio
items.content_html: Version 26.0.9 published on 2025-01-27 The summare of changes are: Updated to draw.io core 26.0.9, using Electron 32.2.5. Includes all changes from version 26.0.8 to 26.0.9 for enhanced stability and performance.

items.title: etlp2pcapng
items.content_html: Version v1.11.0 published on 2023-06-08 The summare of changes are: Improved handling of pktmon captures for better processing and stability.

items.title: ffmpeg
items.content_html: Version 7.1 published on 2024-09-30 The summare of changes are: FFmpeg 7.1 'PÃ©ter' introduces various performance improvements and updates to the library versions. It is the latest stable release from the 7.1 branch. This version was cut from the master branch on 2024-09-24.

items.title: gateway
items.content_html: Version unstable-alpha published on 2025-03-07 The summare of changes are: This is an unstable alpha release with a deprecated API. Core library components are functional, but the API is undergoing significant changes. The release serves as a snapshot during the migration process.

items.title: gitlab-cli
items.content_html: Version v1.22.0 published on 2022-01-10 The summare of changes are: Introduced new features such as --reviewer and --squash-before-merge parameters and a command to retry CI jobs. Improvements include updated documentation and resolved issues with incorrect timestamps in CI pipeline views.

items.title: gitlab-releaser-cli
items.content_html: Version 17.9.0 published on 2025-02-17 The summare of changes are: This release introduces advanced context resolver capabilities and optimizations for the release orchestration category.

items.title: gitlab-runner-agent
items.content_html: Version 17.9.0 published on 2025-02-17 The summare of changes are: The release includes bug fixes, performance improvements, and new features for enhanced CI/CD pipelines.

items.title: golang
items.content_html: Version 1.24.0 published on 2023-10-10 The summare of changes are: Go 1.24.0 introduces updates and fixes to improve performance and security.

items.title: golang1.22
items.content_html: Version 1.22.12 published on 2025-02-04 The summare of changes are: Includes security fixes to the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes to the compiler and the go command.

items.title: golang1.23
items.content_html: Version go1.23.6 published on 2025-02-04 The summare of changes are: Includes security fixes for the crypto/elliptic package and bug fixes for the compiler and the go command.

items.title: helm
items.content_html: Version v3.17.1 published on 2025-02-12 The summare of changes are: Helm v3.17.1 is a patch release that includes important bug fixes and enhancements. Users are encouraged to upgrade for optimal experience. Community engagement and contributions continue to grow.

items.title: inkscape
items.content_html: Version 1.4 published on 2024-10-13 The summare of changes are: Inkscape 1.4 introduces new features like Filter Gallery, modular grids, improved axonometric grids, and customizable handles, along with Affinity Designer file import and faster extensions.
Version  published on  The summare of changes are:

items.title: jmeter
items.content_html: Version 5.6.3 published on 2024-01-07 The summare of changes are: The latest stable release includes updates and bug fixes for improved performance and reliability, along with minor enhancements to user features.

items.title: jq
items.content_html: Version 1.7.1 published on 2023-12-13 The summare of changes are: Fixed critical vulnerabilities CVE-2023-50246 and CVE-2023-50268 while introducing CLI and language improvements, enhancing stability and memory management.

items.title: kubectl
items.content_html: Version 1.32.2 published on 2025-02-11 The summare of changes are: This release includes the latest fixes and updates for Kubernetes, improving stability and performance under v1.32.

items.title: make-win
items.content_html: Version 3.81 published on 2006-11-25 The summare of changes are: The release provides the GNU Make utility for Windows, enabling developers to efficiently manage builds and dependencies using makefiles. It includes automatic file updates based on changes and supports multiple programming languages. This version ensures compatibility with Windows platforms and includes essential dependencies.

items.title: maven
items.content_html: Version 3.9.9 published on 2025-02-16 The summare of changes are: Apache Maven 3.9.9 is the latest stable release, recommended for all users. It includes the latest features and bug fixes. Users are encouraged to upgrade for optimal performance and stability.

items.title: miniconda
items.content_html: Version 25.1.1-2 published on 2025-02-11 The summare of changes are: Includes bug fixes and updates, such as conda-anaconda-tos upgraded to version 0.1.2.

items.title: node
items.content_html: Version v20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10 The summare of changes are: The release includes various bug fixes, performance improvements, and updates to dependencies for enhanced compatibility.

items.title: node16
items.content_html: Version v16.20.2 published on 2023-08-08 The summare of changes are: This release contains critical fixes and improvements to ensure the stability and security of Node.js Gallium.

items.title: node18
items.content_html: Version 18.20.6 published on 2025-01-21 The summare of changes are: This release includes maintenance improvements and ensures compatibility with the latest ecosystem updates.

items.title: node20
items.content_html: Version v20.18.3 published on 2025-02-10 The summare of changes are: This release includes minor updates and bug fixes, ensuring enhanced stability and performance for production applications.

items.title: node22
items.content_html: Version v22.14.0 published on 2025-02-11 The summare of changes are: This release includes updates for stabilizing performance and bug fixes, ensuring better quality in long-term support.

items.title: notepad-plus-plus
items.content_html: Version v8.7.7 published on 2025-02-07 The summare of changes are: The release of v8.7.7 addresses the regression in v8.7.6 related to certain SCN_MODIFIED notification events with a few plugins and includes the new API NPPM_ADDSCNMODIFIEDFLAGS.

items.title: openshift
items.content_html: Version 4.17.0-okd-scos.0 published on 2024-12-16T20:49:54Z The summare of changes are: This release includes updates copied from the okd-scos repository with preconfigured client tools for installation and verification.

items.title: oraclejdk11
items.content_html: Version 11.0.26 published on 2025-01-21 The summare of changes are: This release includes IANA time zone updates for 2024b, new debugging options for java.security, and enhanced compatibility for ProcessBuilder on Windows.

items.title: oraclejdk17
items.content_html: Version 17.0.14 published on 2025-01-21 The summare of changes are: JDK 17.0.14 contains updates to IANA time zone data, enhanced security baselines, and bug fixes addressing issues across multiple components. It introduces new changes like better historical timezone data and updates to process handling on Windows.

items.title: oraclejdk21
items.content_html: Version 21.0.6 published on 2025-01-21 The summare of changes are: This release updates to IANA time zone data 2024b, improves historical data for Mexico, Mongolia, and Portugal, and includes several security and performance fixes addressing critical issues.

items.title: oraclejdk8
items.content_html: Version 8u441 published on Not Provided The summare of changes are: Latest stable release of JDK 8 which includes various updates and improvements. Incorporates fixes from previous updates and ensures enhanced performance.

items.title: powershell
items.content_html: Version 7.5.0 published on 2025-01-23 The summare of changes are: This release includes updates to .NET SDK 9.0.102, various build and packaging improvements, and ensures the build is marked as the latest stable version.

items.title: putty
items.content_html: Version 0.83 published on 2025-02-08 The summare of changes are: The latest stable version of PuTTY includes updated utilities and fixes for improved performance and reliability across supported platforms.

items.title: python310
items.content_html: Version 3.10.0 published on 2021-10-04 The summare of changes are: Python 3.10.0 introduces significant features such as precise debugging tools, structural pattern matching, and enhanced union type syntax. It also deprecates distutils and streamlines Unicode handling. This release improves developer productivity while preparing for future compatibility enhancements.

items.title: python311
items.content_html: Version 3.11.0 published on 2022-10-24 The summare of changes are: Python 3.11.0 introduces significant speed improvements, new features such as fine-grained error locations, exception groups, and TOML parsing, along with typing enhancements.

items.title: python312
items.content_html: Version 3.12.0 published on 2023-10-02 The summare of changes are: Python 3.12.0 introduces new features such as enhanced f-string parsing, isolated subinterpreters with separate GIL, and performance improvements estimated at 5% overall. Deprecated modules like smtpd and distutils were removed. Additionally, improved error messages and type annotation enhancements are highlights.

items.title: python39
items.content_html: Version 3.9.0 published on 2020-10-05 The summare of changes are: Python 3.9 introduces major features such as union operators in dict, type hinting generics, and a new PEG parser, along with performance improvements and enhanced compatibility.

items.title: rider
items.content_html: Version 2023.2.3 published on 2023-09-15 The summare of changes are: Bug fixes and performance improvements to enhance development productivity.

items.title: screentogif
items.content_html: Version 2.40 published on 2023-12-06 The summare of changes are: This release updates ScreenToGif with compatibility for .NET 8 and enhances performance for Windows 10 1607 or later.

items.title: task
items.content_html: Version v3.41.0 published on 2025-01-18 The summare of changes are: Fixed multiple issues, including dynamic variables logging, concurrent map writes, and template function errors. Added new features such as TASK_DIR variable and improvements to installation documentation. Refactored internal functionalities for better performance.

items.title: terraform
items.content_html: Version v1.10.5 published on 2025-01-22 The summare of changes are: Bug fixes include resolving crashes with negative tuple indices, enhancements to jsondecode error messages, and a CVE-related update to a dependency.

items.title: vscode
items.content_html: Version 1.97 published on 2025-01 The summare of changes are: This update includes enhancements like Copilot Next Edit Suggestions, repositionable Command Palette, and new Git blame tools, alongside various accessibility improvements and bug fixes.

items.title: windows-terminal
items.content_html: Version 1.22.10352.0 published on 2023-02-06 The summare of changes are: This stable release introduces a rewritten console hosting implementation for improved performance, support for Sixels, enhanced grapheme cluster handling, as well as a new UI for CMD and Python input pop-ups.

items.title: winmerge
items.content_html: Version 2.16.46 published on 2025-01-27 The summare of changes are: This is a stable release that includes bug fixes such as addressing ALT-F4 behavior, improving folder comparison functionality, and resolving plugin display issues. Translation updates for multiple languages are also included. Additionally, it fixes minor errors in the WinMerge manual.

items.title: wireshark
items.content_html: Version 4.4.3 published on unknown The summare of changes are: The latest stable release, superseding all previous versions, ensuring updated features and fixes for better packet analysis.

items.title: yq
items.content_html: Version v4.45.1 published on 2025-01-12 The summare of changes are: Added support to create parent directories when using --split-exp and bumped dependencies.
